foldocml
Class PenaltyFunc

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--foldocml.PenaltyFunc
Direct Known Subclasses:
SearchPenalty
public class PenaltyFunc
extends java.lang.Object

A Superclass for Penalty Functions - to return a penalty multiplier to the distance result for common nodes, based on the nodes that are disjoint

penalty (GLOBAL) and penaltyFinal (LOCAL) should return a number in [0, 1] to multiply a base similarity by to reduce the similarity

The base class uses an heuristic based only on the cardinality of the disjoint/common sets

Version:
0.4
Author:
Trent Apted
See Also:
Connection.ratioSimilar1(HashGraph g1, HashGraph g2, PrintStream log)
